cyclone.name: HARVEY
cyclone.current_location: about 365 miles SE of Corpus Christi, Texas
cyclone.trajectory: Moving north-northwest, forecast to bend northwest and slow, tracking toward the middle Texas coast and then lingering near the coast through the weekend.
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: middle Texas coast (near Port O’Connor–Corpus Christi, TX)

weather_observation.watch_coast: South of Port Mansfield, TX to the Mouth of the Rio Grande and north of San Luis Pass to High Island, TX (Storm-Surge & Hurricane watches).
weather_observation.warning_coast: Port Mansfield to San Luis Pass, TX (Storm-Surge Warning); Port Mansfield to Matagorda, TX (Hurricane Warning); Matagorda to High Island, TX and south of Port Mansfield to the Mouth of the Rio Grande (Tropical-Storm Warning).
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Middle and upper Texas coast with some effects extending into southwestern Louisiana.
